p.s: In scene 3 of the play Disgraced, Scene 3 by Ayad Akhtar, things rapidly change when Isaac's wife, Jory, caught Emily and Isaac kissing.
The situation escalates very quickly as Jory accuses Emily to have an affair with her husband Isaac.
Emily and Isaac both say that they weren't kissing and they never had an affair.
Amir who has also entered the room believes Isaac and Emily and thinks that Jory is trying to destroy his marriage after she already stole his job.
Amir goes into rage, he insults Isaac with asshole and goes face to face with him.
Amir who is emotional exploding spits in Isaac's face.
Because of this, Isaac says that there is a reason people call him animals which is a hard racist insult.
Isaac walks out and Jory also collects her things and goes.
After Isaac and Jory are gone, Emily and Amir are alone.
Amir, who doesn't have ana clear mind anymore, asks Emily if she slept with Isaac.
Emily doesn't want to lie anymore tells Amir the truth.
She also says that she is disgusted of herself and that it was a huge mistake.
Amir who is still controlled by his emotions, hits Emily with multiple blows.
When Amir realized what he has done, Abe, Amir's nephew comes through the door and sees Emily on the Groundground with Bloodblood covering her Faceface.
